name: Local Business Showcase
description: Full-stack SaaS platform for showcasing and managing local Costa Rican businesses. Includes user authentication, individual dashboards, and business management tools. Built with Angular, Node.js, Express, and SQL Server using the MVC architecture.

name: Full Stack Course Management System
description: Web app for managing academic courses with full CRUD functionality. Built with React, Redux, Node.js, Express (MVC), and SQL Server using stored procedures.

name: E-Commerce
description: Built a responsive e-commerce platform for vehicle parts, focusing on performance, scalability, and security.

name: Pomodoro Timer
description: A Pomodoro timer with notifications and task management, with data stored in localStorage for persistence.

name: Task Manager
description: A React-based To-Do list app with localStorage for task management and data persistence.
